moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a good chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Gloves Off!
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs and makes their next attack a sure hit.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

passives.name: On the Ropes 3
passives.description: Reduces damage when the Pokémon is in a pinch and is hit by a physical attack move.
